name: NewsData
description: Best News API To Search And Collect Worldwide News

api_methods.name: sources
api_methods.description:
News sources endpoint provides access to the subsets of news publishers that the latest news is available from.

It's mainly a convenience endpoint that you can use to keep track of the publishers available on the API, and you can pipe it straight through to your users

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Find sources that display news in a specific country. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca sg

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Find sources that display news in a specific language. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Find sources that display news of this category. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

utterances.utterance: Find news sources in the United States.
Get news sources that display news in English.
Show me news sources for business news.
Find news sources in Japan that display news in Japanese.
Get news sources in India for sports news.
Find news sources in the United Arab Emirates that display news in Arabic.
Show me news sources in Australia for health news.
Get news sources in Canada that display news in French.
Find news sources in Singapore for technology news.
Show me news sources in the United Kingdom for entertainment news.

api_methods.name: news
api_methods.description:
The latest news endpoint provides access to the latest and breaking news for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains. The news articles are sorted by the publish date.

Retrieving the latest news allows you to build experience such as showcasing the latest news, breaking news tickers and analyzing News to better understand their content.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

parameters.name: qintitle
parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. 
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

utterances.utterance: Find the latest news in English from the United States.
Search for news articles about technology in Japan.
Get the latest sports news from India.
Find news articles with the keyword 'climate change' in the title.
Search for news about health in both English and French.
Get the latest business news from the UK and Canada.
Find news articles from the domains 'bbc.com' and 'cnn.com'.
Search for news articles about science in Arabic from Saudi Arabia.
Get the latest entertainment news in Spanish from Spain.
Find news articles with the keyword 'election' in the title and content.

api_methods.name: archive
api_methods.description:
The news archive endpoint provides access to the old news data for a country, for a specific category in a country, or for a single or multiple domains.

Retrieving a piece of old news allows you to get the past news data for research and analysis purposes.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: A comma separated string of domains (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Use the /domains endpoint to find top sources id.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title and content. The value must be URL-encoded
Please note: You can't use AND and OR in the same query.

parameters.name: qintitle
parameters.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the news title only.

Please note: This parameter can't be used with q parameter in the same query.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A comma separated string of categories (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: top business science technology sports health entertainment

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: A date and optional time for the oldest article allowed. This should be in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: A comma separated string of languages (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: en ar jp in es fr

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Use this to page through the results if the total results found is greater than the page size.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: A date and optional time for the newest article allowed. This should be in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: A comma separated string of 2-letter ISO 3166-1 countries (maximum 5) to restrict the search to. Possible Options: us gb in jp ae sa au ca
